name: JXHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the office”
”Alexa, turn off the office”
”Alexa, set the office to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You'll need to use the JXHome app for iOS or Android to connect your lights to your home network.With the JXHome skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your JXHome lights. To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your JXHome account and say,"Alexa, discover my devices" or running a device discovery in the Smart Home screen of the Alexa app.

On/Off Controls:
 You can turn devices on/off, for example: "Alexa, turn on my {device name}" or "Alexa, turn off my {device name}".
 You can set the brightness, for example: "Alexa, set my {device name} to 50 percent". 
 
Color Controls:
 You can change the device's color, say, "Alexa, set my {device name} to yellow". And you can also control color temperature,for example: "Alexa, set the {device name} to warm white”.
